main.name: Mitch Bilensky
main.description: Professional Code Monkey, enjoys the work and keeps up to date with the latest tech.
main.bio: General tech enthusiast with an interest in cloud development and architecture, DevOps, and automation. Has been working as a full stack developer since 2015 mainly with Java (Spring Boot) and JS (React) with a focus on the cloud. Apart from that I'm generally found out walking the trails with my dogs or sitting on the patio of a craft brewery enjoying a drink.

resume.skillmessage: Full stack developer with a focus on cloud first solutions. Will dabble in any new tech I find interesting. Ask me about Git and Infrastructure as Code! This website is even built using AWS CloudFormation with CI/CD!

education.description: Started as an idea with good job prospects and ended up enjoying it. Turned out pretty well, and happen to be good at it.

work.title: Software Consultant
work.description: Accreon was acquired by Quantiphi and the existing scrum team continued and personal role expanded to add the role of Architect for  the migration for an insurance provider web client  from an on-prem to an AWS solution.

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description: Lead a scrum team of developers contracted for planning, building, deploying, and maintaining a series of cloud services used to automate business operations performed by a leading electronic health record platform. Primarily use Java and React to deploy containerized solutions to replace manual workflows used for data cleanliness and mergers & acquisitions with systems automated wherever possible and allow putting the data in the hands of the end users wherever possible

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Worked within a team of developers consulting for a large electronic health record system for a nursing home software solution. Built various solutions within their monolith application primarily including a document generation, management, and eSignature solution for custom admission documents integrated with an eSignature vendor and a CRM solution for managing incoming clients and tracking their onboarding workflows.
